mapper.insert: insert into e_room_task(name, buildingName, startTime, status) values (#{name}, #{buildingName}, now(), #{status, typeHandler=com.hust.bill.electric.dao.TaskStatusTypeHandler})
mapper.update: update e_room_task set status = #{status, typeHandler=com.hust.bill.electric.dao.TaskStatusTypeHandler} where id = #{id}
update e_room_task set endTime = now() where id = #{id}
update e_room_task set resultCount = (select count(id) from e_room_task_result where taskId = #{id}) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from e_room_task where name = #{name}
select id, name, buildingName, startTime, endTime, resultCount, status from e_room_task

insert.if:

mapper.select: select id,taskId, buildingName, roomName, roomFloor, roomNO from e_room_task_result where taskId= #{taskID}

mapper.select: select taskId, taskName, buildingName, resultId, roomName, roomFloor, roomNO, operate, timestamp from e_building_operate where taskId= #{taskID}
select taskId, taskName, buildingName, resultId, roomName, roomFloor, roomNO, operate, timestamp from e_building_operate

insert into e_room(buildingName, roomName, roomFloor, roomNO) values
(#{item.buildingName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomFloor, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.roomNO, jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select buildingName, roomName, roomFloor, roomNO from e_room where buildingName = #{buildingName} order by roomName asc
